lines.text: I'm just going to give you a little time... to try to be reasonable. If you decide you're not going to be reasonable, then one night when you come home, you'll find me *inside*, waiting for you. And that will be the night you'll wish you'd never been born.

[threatening Miles Cullen]
Give me the money, fucker.
I feel as though I know you very well.
Then you know I'm ready to kill you.
Sometimes it's better if you just like someone, nothing more than that.
Like someone and have... a little something in common.
And I'm not sure I want to.
